content: Peter Hoyer's home page Peter Hoyer Home Teaching For students Research Publications My interests are in all aspects of quantum computing and theoretical computer science. Keywords describing my interests are: quantum computing, algorithmics, complexity theory, communication complexity, cryptography, probabilistic arguments, lower bounds, information theory, spectral analysis, discrete mathematics, data structures, simulations, and machine learning. I teach courses, mentor, supervise, and conduct research in all of these areas. Peter Hoyer ICT 653 hoyer [at] ucalgary [dot] ca Mailing address: Department of Computer Science ICT 602 University of Calgary 2500 University Drive N.W. Calgary, Alberta Canada T2N 1N4 https://www.cpsc.ucalgary.ca/~hoyer/
